segments.advisor_message: So, can we talk about your income sources? Like, uh, do you have a specific name for the income like, salary or, um, rental income?
segments.client_message: Oh, yeah, I mean I have my salary, it's around 4000 every month. It’s, um, gross income though.

segments.advisor_message: Got it! So, your monthly salary is 4000 gross. Now, do you have any other sources or like notes on this income?
segments.client_message: Um, nope, just that. But, I guess, I could send you some proof of my salary? Oh, and it keeps, you know, increasing annually by like 3%?
